attributes.action: Make funds available to help sufferers from alopaecia.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people (especially ladies) who suffer from alopaecia find that they are prescribed anti depression drugs. Many turn to private clinics who offer hair extensions and similar treatments at great cost. Many of these women suffer great hardship as a result. Surely the NHS should recognise the costs they save on anti-depressants and should make some contribution to the treatment.
